title: How can we reset the world to factory settings? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no evidence of the world having been manufactured by an intelligent designer and hence cannot be restored to factory settings that each and everyone could find agreement upon.

You want us to abandon everything we have learnt and start again as some bacteria ? No medication, no science, no buildings. And by doing this, there is no guarantee that there will be an asteroid so we can come back, starve, freeze and get eaten by sabre tooth tigers. What an awful horrible idea.
